metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6519 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The SAML2 library before 1.10.4, 2.x before 2.3.5, and 3.x before 3.1.1 in SimpleSAMLphp has a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability for fraction-of-seconds data in a timestamp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-6519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
